content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * pretzel scarf can be worn twisted knotted or even tied into a cowl this design is knit from end to end using fingering weight yarn and has bands of stockinette and reverse stockinette stitches you can knit to your preferred length or until yarn runs out please have a minimum of 570 yards / 525 meters fingering weight yarn this design will also work with lace sport or dk weight yarns sample scarf knit with wollmeise pure in meilenstein enjoy materials 3 50mm / us 4 needles / uk 9 minimum 525 meters / 570 yards fingering weight yarn 1 stitch marker gauge 24 stitches in stockinette stitch = 4 inches approximate measurements after blocking 14 at widest part x 64 long length is adjustable pattern information number of pages 3 language s english instructions written photos 2 schematic 1
